name: CloudFrontDistributionConfigRestrictionsGeoRestriction
description: GeoRestriction is a property of the CloudFront DistributionConfiguration Restrictions property that describes the countries in which Amazon CloudFront allows viewers to access your content.

properties.name: Locations
properties.desc: The two-letter, uppercase country code for a country that you want to include in your blacklist or whitelist.

properties.name: RestrictionType
properties.desc: The method to restrict distribution of your content:

properties.name: blacklist
properties.desc: Prevents viewers in the countries that you specified from accessing your content.

properties.name: whitelist
properties.desc: Allows viewers in the countries that you specified to access your content.
